Entrance of Bank.Body: You are looking at the main entrance of the bank.

Choices.Text: Go into the Main Lobby
Sneak through Back Entrance
Crawl through the Vents

Main Lobby.Body: You are now in the main lobby, and there are many guards here.

Choices.Text: Head to the Payphone
Go back outside to the Entrance of the Bank

Back Entrance.Body: You snuck through the back entrance and find two rooms.

Choices.Text: Head through the room labeled 'Cam Room'
Go back to the Entrance of the Bank

Vents.Body: You are crawling through the vents and have direct access to the door of the saferoom.

Choices.Text: Drop down in front of Door to the Saferoom
Crawl back out to the Entrance of the Bank
Go back to the Main Lobby
Pick up the phone

CallMessage.Body: You answer and the distorted voice on the other end tells you to find the key in the Bathroom behind the sink.

Choices.Text: Go back to the Main Lobby
Continue to the Bathroom

Bathroom.Body: You are inside the bathroom and there is someone inside one of the stalls.

Choices.Text: Collect the key to the Door to the Safe
Go back to Main Lobby

GetKey.Body: You acquired the key to the Door to the Safe.

Choices.Text: Go back to Main Lobby

CamRoom.Body: You find a man sleeping in his chair with a large control panel in front of him. There are also a dozen monitors displaying different rooms of the bank.

Choices.Text: Press the red button labeled 'Power' to disable all the cameras in the building

DisableCams.Body: You push the button and all the monitors go dark.

Choices.Text: Head back to the Back Entrance

DoortoSafe.Body: There is a large steel door guarding the saferoom. It is locked without the key.

Choices.Text: Use the key to unlock the door and go to the Safe
Climb back through the Vents
You unlock the safe, retrieve the money, and now must go back the way you came to escape unnoticed
Go back to the vents

Escape.Body: You crawl back through the vents and escape successfully.
